cnbc.title: Cisco reports narrow earnings beat, issues inline forecast for the year
cnbc.summary: Cisco posted Q4 revenue up 7.6% to $14.67 billion and its 2026 forecast on track with strong AI infrastructure orders.

cnbc.title: Google faces loss of Chrome as Perplexity bid adds drama to looming breakup decision
cnbc.summary: Perplexity AI's offer of $34.5 billion for Google's Chrome browser is a lot lower than where some analysts value the business.

cnbc.title: CoreWeave tanks 20% after posting wider-than-expected loss ahead of lock-up expiration
cnbc.summary: CoreWeave's stock dropped 20% after the renter of artificial intelligence data centers reported a bigger-than-expected loss.

cnbc.title: Elon Musk's xAI loses co-founder Igor Babuschkin, who's leaving to start venture firm
cnbc.summary: Igor Babuschkin, who helped start xAI in 2023, said in a post on X that he's leaving the artificial intelligence startup to launch his own venture firm.

cnbc.title: Trump considering 11 candidates for Fed chair, including David Zervos and Rick Rieder, sources say
cnbc.summary: The size of the Fed Chair candidate list and the process described suggest a decision is not imminent and could take a considerable amount of time.

cnbc.title: As Trump berates Goldman, other economists agree that higher tariff inflation is coming
cnbc.summary: Goldman Sachs is taking the heat for its call that heavier tariff-induced consumer inflation is ahead, but it's far from alone in that view.

cnbc.title: Cava, Chipotle and other fast-casual restaurant chains are finally hit by consumer slowdown
cnbc.summary: After bucking industry trends, fast-casual chains like Chipotle and Cava are finally feeling the consumer slowdown.

cnbc.title: Coffee and tea prices continue to ramp up due to tariffs, worrying retailers and importers
cnbc.summary: According to the Bureau of Labor Statistics, coffee prices surged 14.5% in July year over year. The average retail price for a pound of ground coffee hit $8.41.

cnbc.title: Trump's budget bill made 529 college savings plans even more powerful—here's what it means for your money
cnbc.summary: The 'big beautiful' budget bill expands the tax advantages of 529 accounts, vehicles that parents have traditionally used to save for their kids' college costs.

cnbc.title: Nearly 1 in 5 older student loan borrowers are seriously delinquent as Trump steps up collections
cnbc.summary: There's still time for older student loan borrowers who are behind on their bills to avoid default, and garnishment of their retirement benefits and wages.
